Description: The name of the retailer or store where the sale occurred.
Sample Values / Range: Walmart, Tesco, Carrefour, Amazon Fresh, Costco

Description: The country where the store is located.
Sample Values / Range: UK, USA, India, UAE, Canada, Australia, Singapore

Description: Stock Keeping Unit; represents the specific product variant sold.
Sample Values / Range: Ferrero Rocher T3, Ferrero Rocher 24pc, Ferrero Collection 15pc

Description: The date of the transaction in Excel Serial Date format. Covers the full year of 2025.
The sales channel through which the transaction was made.
The marketing promotion applied to the sale. NaN indicates no promotion was active.
Sample Values / Range: Diwali Promo, Buy1Get1, NewYear Sale, Christmas Promo, Valentine Promo

Description: The quantity of units sold in the transaction.
The price of a single unit before any discounts (currency not specified, likely local or normalized).
The discount percentage applied to the unit price.
The total income generated from the sale. Calculated as: Units Sold * Unit Price * (1 - Discount)
The profit margin percentage for the transaction.
The total profit amount earned from the transaction. Calculated as: Revenue * (Margin % / 100)
